posts.post_content:
Hi all, I am looking to sell a couple T212s.  I am accepting PayPal for these . Prices are net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal. Domestic shipping is on me. Shipping to other countries, I will work with you on price.

Million, SGC 20- $450Sold
Weaver, ungraded- $1000

Additional scans available on request. Thanks, and feel free to e-mail any questions: [url]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/url].

First commitment to buy will go before ongoing negotiations.

[STRIKE] Buy both and receive $200 off.  Limited time offer!  Sale ends Sunday, March 14th at 11:59:59 pm CST.  Get,em while they’re hot![/STRIKE]

Now that the Million sold, offer by default must end early.
